<a id="class_CPUParticles3D"></a>

# CPUParticles3D

**Inherits:** [GeometryInstance3D](class_geometryinstance3d.md) **<** [VisualInstance3D](class_visualinstance3d.md) **<** [Node3D](class_node3d.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A CPU-based 3D particle emitter.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

CPU-based 3D particle node used to create a variety of particle systems and effects.

See also [GPUParticles3D](class_gpuparticles3d.md), which provides the same functionality with hardware acceleration, but may not run on older devices.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Particle systems (3D)](../tutorials/3d/particles/index.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_signal_finished"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**finished**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_signal_finished)

Emitted when all active particles have finished processing. When [one_shot](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_one_shot) is disabled, particles will process continuously, so this is never emitted.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_CPUParticles3D_DrawOrder"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **DrawOrder**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_CPUParticles3D_DrawOrder)

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_DRAW_ORDER_INDEX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DrawOrder](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_DrawOrder) **DRAW_ORDER_INDEX** = `0`

Particles are drawn in the order emitted.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_DRAW_ORDER_LIFETIME"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DrawOrder](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_DrawOrder) **DRAW_ORDER_LIFETIME** = `1`

Particles are drawn in order of remaining lifetime. In other words, the particle with the highest lifetime is drawn at the front.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_DRAW_ORDER_VIEW_DEPTH"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DrawOrder](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_DrawOrder) **DRAW_ORDER_VIEW_DEPTH** = `2`

Particles are drawn in order of depth.<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Parameter**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter)

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_INITIAL_LINEAR_VELOCITY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_INITIAL_LINEAR_VELOCITY** = `0`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set initial velocity properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_ANGULAR_VELOCITY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_ANGULAR_VELOCITY** = `1`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set angular velocity properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_ORBIT_VELOCITY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_ORBIT_VELOCITY** = `2`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set orbital velocity properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_ACCEL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_LINEAR_ACCEL** = `3`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set linear acceleration properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_RADIAL_ACCEL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_RADIAL_ACCEL** = `4`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set radial acceleration properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_TANGENTIAL_ACCEL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_TANGENTIAL_ACCEL** = `5`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set tangential acceleration properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_DAMPING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_DAMPING** = `6`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set damping properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_ANGLE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_ANGLE** = `7`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set angle properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_SCALE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_SCALE** = `8`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set scale properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_HUE_VARIATION"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter) **PARAM_HUE_VARIATION** = `9`

Use with [set_param_min()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_min), [set_param_max()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_max), and [set_param_curve()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve) to set hue variation properties.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_PARAM_ANIM_SPEED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

<a id="enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **EmissionShape**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape)

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_POINT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_POINT** = `0`

All particles will be emitted from a single point.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE** = `1`

Particles will be emitted in the volume of a sphere.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE_SURFACE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_SPHERE_SURFACE** = `2`

Particles will be emitted on the surface of a sphere.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_BOX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_BOX** = `3`

Particles will be emitted in the volume of a box.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS** = `4`

Particles will be emitted at a position chosen randomly among [emission_points](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_points). Particle color will be modulated by [emission_colors](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors).<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS** = `5`

Particles will be emitted at a position chosen randomly among [emission_points](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_points). Particle velocity and rotation will be set based on [emission_normals](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_normals). Particle color will be modulated by [emission_colors](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors).<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_RING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_RING** = `6`

Particles will be emitted in a ring or cylinder.<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[EmissionShape](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape) **EMISSION_SHAPE_MAX** = `7`

Represents the size of the [EmissionShape](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_EmissionShape) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](class_color.md) **color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_color**\ (\ )

Each particle's initial color.

\ **Note:** [color](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color) multiplies the particle mesh's vertex colors. To have a visible effect on a [BaseMaterial3D](class_basematerial3d.md), [BaseMaterial3D.vertex_color_use_as_albedo](class_basematerial3d.md#class_BaseMaterial3D_property_vertex_color_use_as_albedo) *must* be ``true``. For a [ShaderMaterial](class_shadermaterial.md), ``ALBEDO *= COLOR.rgb;`` must be inserted in the shader's ``fragment()`` function. Otherwise, [color](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color) will have no visible effect.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_initial_ramp"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Gradient](class_gradient.md) **color_initial_ramp** [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_initial_ramp)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color_initial_ramp**\ (\ value\: [Gradient](class_gradient.md)\ )
- [Gradient](class_gradient.md) **get_color_initial_ramp**\ (\ )

Each particle's initial color will vary along this [Gradient](class_gradient.md) (multiplied with [color](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color)).

\ **Note:** [color_initial_ramp](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_initial_ramp) multiplies the particle mesh's vertex colors. To have a visible effect on a [BaseMaterial3D](class_basematerial3d.md), [BaseMaterial3D.vertex_color_use_as_albedo](class_basematerial3d.md#class_BaseMaterial3D_property_vertex_color_use_as_albedo) *must* be ``true``. For a [ShaderMaterial](class_shadermaterial.md), ``ALBEDO *= COLOR.rgb;`` must be inserted in the shader's ``fragment()`` function. Otherwise, [color_initial_ramp](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_initial_ramp) will have no visible effect.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_ramp"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Gradient](class_gradient.md) **color_ramp** [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_ramp)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color_ramp**\ (\ value\: [Gradient](class_gradient.md)\ )
- [Gradient](class_gradient.md) **get_color_ramp**\ (\ )

Each particle's color will vary along this [Gradient](class_gradient.md) over its lifetime (multiplied with [color](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color)).

\ **Note:** [color_ramp](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_ramp) multiplies the particle mesh's vertex colors. To have a visible effect on a [BaseMaterial3D](class_basematerial3d.md), [BaseMaterial3D.vertex_color_use_as_albedo](class_basematerial3d.md#class_BaseMaterial3D_property_vertex_color_use_as_albedo) *must* be ``true``. For a [ShaderMaterial](class_shadermaterial.md), ``ALBEDO *= COLOR.rgb;`` must be inserted in the shader's ``fragment()`` function. Otherwise, [color_ramp](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_ramp) will have no visible effect.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_direction"></a>

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_box_extents"></a>

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedColorArray](class_packedcolorarray.md) **emission_colors** = `PackedColorArray()` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_colors**\ (\ value\: [PackedColorArray](class_packedcolorarray.md)\ )
- [PackedColorArray](class_packedcolorarray.md) **get_emission_colors**\ (\ )

Sets the [Color](class_color.md)\ s to modulate particles by when using [EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS) or [EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS).

\ **Note:** [emission_colors](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors) multiplies the particle mesh's vertex colors. To have a visible effect on a [BaseMaterial3D](class_basematerial3d.md), [BaseMaterial3D.vertex_color_use_as_albedo](class_basematerial3d.md#class_BaseMaterial3D_property_vertex_color_use_as_albedo) *must* be ``true``. For a [ShaderMaterial](class_shadermaterial.md), ``ALBEDO *= COLOR.rgb;`` must be inserted in the shader's ``fragment()`` function. Otherwise, [emission_colors](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors) will have no visible effect.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedColorArray](class_packedcolorarray.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_normals"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedVector3Array](class_packedvector3array.md) **emission_normals** [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_normals)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_normals**\ (\ value\: [PackedVector3Array](class_packedvector3array.md)\ )
- [PackedVector3Array](class_packedvector3array.md) **get_emission_normals**\ (\ )

Sets the direction the particles will be emitted in when using [EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedVector3Array](class_packedvector3array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_points"></a>

[PackedVector3Array](class_packedvector3array.md) **emission_points** [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_points)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_points**\ (\ value\: [PackedVector3Array](class_packedvector3array.md)\ )

Sets the initial positions to spawn particles when using [EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS) or [EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedVector3Array](class_packedvector3array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_ring_axis"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector3](class_vector3.md) **emission_ring_axis** [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_ring_axis)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_ring_axis**\ (\ value\: [Vector3](class_vector3.md)\ )
- [Vector3](class_vector3.md) **get_emission_ring_axis**\ (\ )

The axis of the ring when using the emitter [EMISSION_SHAPE_RING](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_RING).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_ring_cone_angle"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **emission_ring_cone_angle** [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_ring_cone_angle)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emission_ring_cone_angle**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_emission_ring_cone_angle**\ (\ )

The angle of the cone when using the emitter [EMISSION_SHAPE_RING](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_RING). The default angle of 90 degrees results in a ring, while an angle of 0 degrees results in a cone. Intermediate values will result in a ring where one end is larger than the other.

\ **Note:** Depending on [emission_ring_height](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_ring_height), the angle may be clamped if the ring's end is reached to form a perfect cone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_ring_height"></a>

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_emitting"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **emitting** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emitting)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_emitting**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_emitting**\ (\ )

If ``true``, particles are being emitted. [emitting](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emitting) can be used to start and stop particles from emitting. However, if [one_shot](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_one_shot) is ``true`` setting [emitting](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_emitting) to ``true`` will not restart the emission cycle until after all active particles finish processing. You can use the [finished](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_signal_finished) signal to be notified once all active particles finish processing.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_explosiveness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **explosiveness** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_explosiveness)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_explosiveness_ratio**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_explosiveness_ratio**\ (\ )

How rapidly particles in an emission cycle are emitted. If greater than ``0``, there will be a gap in emissions before the next cycle begins.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_fixed_fps"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **fixed_fps** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_fixed_fps)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fixed_fps**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_fixed_fps**\ (\ )

The particle system's frame rate is fixed to a value. For example, changing the value to 2 will make the particles render at 2 frames per second. Note this does not slow down the particle system itself.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_flatness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **flatness** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_flatness)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_flatness**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_flatness**\ (\ )

Amount of [spread](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_spread) in Y/Z plane. A value of ``1`` restricts particles to X/Z plane.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_fract_delta"></a>

[bool](class_bool.md) **fract_delta** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_fract_delta)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_fractional_delta**\ (\ )

If ``true``, results in fractional delta calculation which has a smoother particles display effect.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_local_coords"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **local_coords** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_local_coords)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_local_coordinates**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_use_local_coordinates**\ (\ )

If ``true``, particles use the parent node's coordinate space (known as local coordinates). This will cause particles to move and rotate along the **CPUParticles3D** node (and its parents) when it is moved or rotated. If ``false``, particles use global coordinates; they will not move or rotate along the **CPUParticles3D** node (and its parents) when it is moved or rotated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

- [Mesh](class_mesh.md) **get_mesh**\ (\ )

The [Mesh](class_mesh.md) used for each particle. If ``null``, particles will be spheres.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_one_shot"></a>

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_one_shot**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_one_shot**\ (\ )

If ``true``, only one emission cycle occurs. If set ``true`` during a cycle, emission will stop at the cycle's end.

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_particle_flag_align_y"></a>

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_particle_flag_disable_z"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **particle_flag_disable_z** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_particle_flag_disable_z)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_particle_flag**\ (\ particle_flag\: [ParticleFlags](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_ParticleFlags), enable\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_particle_flag**\ (\ particle_flag\: [ParticleFlags](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_ParticleFlags)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

If ``true``, particles will not move on the Z axis.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_particle_flag_rotate_y"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_seed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_seed**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_seed**\ (\ )

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_speed_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **speed_scale** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_speed_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_speed_scale**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_speed_scale**\ (\ )

Particle system's running speed scaling ratio. A value of ``0`` can be used to pause the particles.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_split_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **split_scale** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_split_scale)

- `void` **set_split_scale**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_split_scale**\ (\ )

If set to ``true``, three different scale curves can be specified, one per scale axis.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_spread"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **spread** = `45.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_spread)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_spread**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_spread**\ (\ )

Each particle's initial direction range from ``+spread`` to ``-spread`` degrees. Applied to X/Z plane and Y/Z planes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_tangential_accel_min"></a>

- [float](class_float.md) **get_param_min**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Minimum tangent acceleration.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_use_fixed_seed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **use_fixed_seed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_use_fixed_seed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_fixed_seed**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_use_fixed_seed**\ (\ )

If ``true``, particles will use the same seed for every simulation using the seed defined in [seed](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_seed). This is useful for situations where the visual outcome should be consistent across replays, for example when using Movie Maker mode.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_property_visibility_aabb"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[AABB](class_aabb.md) **visibility_aabb** = `AABB(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_property_visibility_aabb)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_visibility_aabb**\ (\ value\: [AABB](class_aabb.md)\ )
- [AABB](class_aabb.md) **get_visibility_aabb**\ (\ )

The [AABB](class_aabb.md) that determines the node's region which needs to be visible on screen for the particle system to be active.

Grow the box if particles suddenly appear/disappear when the node enters/exits the screen. The [AABB](class_aabb.md) can be grown via code or with the **Particles â†’ Generate AABB** editor tool.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_method_capture_aabb"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[AABB](class_aabb.md) **capture_aabb**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_method_capture_aabb)

Returns the axis-aligned bounding box that contains all the particles that are active in the current frame.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_method_convert_from_particles"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **convert_from_particles**\ (\ particles\: [Node](class_node.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_method_convert_from_particles)

Sets this node's properties to match a given [GPUParticles3D](class_gpuparticles3d.md) node with an assigned [ParticleProcessMaterial](class_particleprocessmaterial.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-method -->

[Curve](class_curve.md) **get_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_method_get_param_curve)

Returns the [Curve](class_curve.md) of the parameter specified by [Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_method_get_particle_flag"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **get_particle_flag**\ (\ particle_flag\: [ParticleFlags](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_ParticleFlags)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_method_get_particle_flag)

Returns the enabled state of the given particle flag.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_method_request_particles_process"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **request_particles_process**\ (\ process_time\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_method_request_particles_process)

Requests the particles to process for extra process time during a single frame.

Useful for particle playback, if used in combination with [use_fixed_seed](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_property_use_fixed_seed) or by calling [restart()](class_cpuparticles3d.md#class_CPUParticles3D_method_restart) with parameter ``keep_seed`` set to ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_method_restart"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **restart**\ (\ keep_seed\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_method_restart)

Restarts the particle emitter.

If `keep_seed` is ``true``, the current random seed will be preserved. Useful for seeking and playback.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_param_curve**\ (\ param\: [Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter), curve\: [Curve](class_curve.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CPUParticles3D_method_set_param_curve)

Sets the [Curve](class_curve.md) of the parameter specified by [Parameter](class_cpuparticles3d.md#enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter). Should be a unit [Curve](class_curve.md).
